original_title: Fmr Kotte SLPP Councillor arrested for indecent exposure, remanded
original_body_lines: Former Kotte SLPP Municipal Councillor, Denzil Padmasiri, who was arrested by the Welikada Police for allegedly exposing his private parts to the principal and a group of parents of a leading girls' school in Kotte has been remanded until August 02 by the Aluthkade Magistrate's Court.
